channel.title: SSL on Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in SSL on Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: Enable HTTPS everywhere
item.description: Finally I finished to configure my HTTPS protocol support for blog.muehlburger.at. Supporting encrypted communication is an important part of the internet today. Everybody should support encrypted communication on the web. A good resource on how to select strong cypher suites and to configure your web server to support encryption properly is bettercrypto.org. There is also a great video covering the current state of the art in crypto held by security researchers at 30C3:
